DOC.brief_title: Phase 1 Study TG02 Citrate Patients With Chronic Lymphocytic Leukemia Small Lymphocytic Lymphoma
DOC.detailed_description: The primary objective determine high dose TG02 citrate safely give patient Chronic Lymphocytic Leukemia Small Lymphocytic Lymphoma .
